hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uthman bin 'Affan said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, admitted to paradise a man who was easygoing in buying and selling, in paying off debts and asking for repayment."' (Sahaih)

chapter.ara-name: باب حُسْنِ الْمُعَامَلَةِ وَالرِّفْقِ فِي الْمُطَالَبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Being Kind When Asking For Repayment
